title: AIML - Sr Engineering Program Manager, Machine Learning
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Do you love taking on challenges that create a positive impact? Are you passionate about empowering many ground-breaking intelligent experiences to be made? The Apple AIML org is building groundbreaking technology... and we are looking for people like you! Apple offers a collaborative work environment that fosters creativity and innovation. Every new product, service, or feature we invent is the result of people working together to make each other's ideas stronger. That happens here because every one of us strives toward a common goal - crafting the best customer experiences.
description:
-  Build and run project timelines with clear dependencies, critical path and systematic methodology to communicate status. Handle risks and mitigations, and re-plan as events warrant. Drive alignment across the organization and between teams

- Partner with cross-functional engineering teams to define requirements around a privacy focused approach to data collection and evaluation vital to launch and maintain premier Apple software products.

-  Work with instrumentation, data science and data engineering teams to develop data collection and evaluation solutions.

-  Work with dynamic cross functional engineering teams to optimize and lead measurement and evaluations efforts.

-  Work with engineering, privacy, and legal teams to develop safe data collection.

-  Work with research teams to develop long-term evaluation solutions.
key_qualifications:
8+ years of experience in driving large scale programs building machine learning powered products
- Excellent program management skills including program structuring and managing multiple work streams interdependently
- Have personally orchestrated the delivery of multiple significant client/server software products requiring large organizations (100+)
- Strong analytical skills and a curiosity to peel the onion to discover opportunities for impact and better user experience
- Capability to work across a large number of teams to enforce process and efficient outcomes in a data-driven environment
- Strong verbal and written communication skills, including negotiation, presentation and influence
